definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: This paper mainly studied the rare earth passivation for LY12 aluminum alloy.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究了LY12铝合金表面的稀土钝化工艺。

sentences.english: The niobium-tantalum and rare-earths ore deposits in China and their occurred minerals are described.
sentences.chinese: 该文对我国铌钽稀土矿床及其产出的矿物进行了论述。

sentences.english: The effects of rare earths on properties and microstructure of low-alloy wear resistance steel were studied .
sentences.chinese: 研究了稀土对低合金耐磨钢组织和性能的影响。

sentences.english: The heavy rare earth and Y also belong to immobile elements.
sentences.chinese: 重稀土元素及Y也属于不活泼元素。

sentences.english: So what are the lessons of the rare earth fracas?
sentences.chinese: 那么这场稀土纷争给人什么的教训？

sentences.english: The strengthening mechanism of rare earth element in sintered copper molybdenum steel has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了稀土在烧结铜钼钢中的作用机理。

sentences.english: Yet it didn’t pledge to underpin all rare earth prices.
sentences.chinese: 但该公司并没有承诺支撑所有稀土元素的价格。

sentences.english: The road to the green world of the future starts from the black earth.
sentences.chinese: 从黑色的稀土开采驶向未来开始的绿色世界。

sentences.english: Heavy rare earths have been the most seriously affected.
Zirconium in rare earth - magnesium - zirconium master alloy was determined by EDTA titrimetry.
sentences.chinese: 采用EDTA滴定法测定了稀土镁锆中间合金中的锆。

sentences.english: The modification effects of low-carbon ferrochromium and rare-earth ferrosilicon take second place.
sentences.chinese: 低碳铬铁和稀土硅铁的变质效果次之。

sentences.english: The improvement factors for creep fracture strength were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了稀土元素改善耐热钢热强性的因素。

sentences.english: Capabilities using rare earth compounds as environmentally friendly gasoline antiknocks were explored.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了稀土化合物用作环保汽油抗爆剂的可能性。

sentences.english: Lanthanide trichlorides display no catalytic effect on the hydrogenation of potassium in presence of naphthalene.
sentences.chinese: 稀土氯化物对金属钾的氢化反应不显示催化作用。

sentences.english: "We want to secure a stable supply of rare earth minerals, " Mutsuura said.
sentences.chinese: “我们想要获得稳定的稀土供应，”六浦说。

sentences.english: The structure and properties of the RE-borovanadizing steels were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了稀土加入量对钢硼钒共渗组织和性能的影响。

definition: non-ferrous metals (all metals excluding iron, chromium, manganese and their alloys)
